title: lol client ask to update again
body: after im updated the game i play some games and close it now my client ask to reupdate again

replies.body: Sounds like your client might have noticed some missing or damaged game files and it's trying to repair those by repatching. You should be able to let that patch finish up and be able to play normally, but if you keep getting stuck in that loop try switching to an ethernet cable and running the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with force repatch turned on.
